Package imusim :: Package environment :: Module magnetic_fields :: Class SolenoidMagneticField

Class SolenoidMagneticField

source code

Model of magnetic field around an ideal solenoid.

Follows equations from N. Derby and S. Olbert, "Cylindrical mangets and ideal solenoids", American Journal of Physics, vol 78, no. 3, pp. 229-235, March 2010.

Method Details

__init__(self, n, I, a, b, transform)
(Constructor)

source code 

Construct solenoid field model.

Parameters:
  • n - Number of coils per unit length.
  • I - Coil current.
  • a - Radius of the coil
  • b - Length of the solenoid.
  • transform - AffineTransform specifying the orientation and position of the solenoid relative to the origin of the world frame.
Overrides: object.__init__

cartesianSolenoidModel(self, position)

source code 

Compute field values of ideal solenoid given Cartesian co-ordinates.

Parameters:
  • position - 3xN np.ndarray of position co-ordinates.

cylindricalSolenoidModel(self, r, phi, z)

source code 

Compute field values of ideal solenoid given cylindrical co-ordinates.

Parameters:
  • r - Radius value(s)
  • phi - Angle value(s).
  • z - Height value(s).
